description: Detects using Diskshadow.exe to execute arbitrary code in text file Author: Ivan Dyachkov, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: False postitve can be if administrators use diskshadow tool in their infrastructure as a main backup tool with scripts.
name: Execution via Diskshadow.exe
